Text.Page:
I'm Elleon.

Titus and I are trying to fend off Exodor's invasion.

We really could use your help.

You’ve helped Elleon destroy Exodor.

But the other Elleon, the powerful one, has disappeared.

Thank you.

I would have been in big trouble if it weren’t for you."I’m glad."

By the way, that other me was incomparably more powerful than myself.

Okay!

I’d better train hard.
